# VisualShaderNodeVec3Constant

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeConstant](VisualShaderNodeConstant.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A [Vector3](Vector3.md) constant to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A constant [Vector3](Vector3.md), which can be used as an input node.
